column5: Went fishing for a two hours with the girlfriend this morning and I landed 3 trout and she landed one with a few other a pan fish. Yesterday I went to Wal-mart and picked myself up a package of powerbait worms to use. Two thumbs up!   These were the two larger ones. 14 inchers  This was my first time catching and keeping a fish. Lastnight I watched some videos on youtube on how to cut and such. I did a great job
good job!!....nice colours on those bows!!
Thanks everyone for your replies:) They didn't put much of a fight either.  I think i may go again next weekend
where did u get the trout?  they look great
Very nice looking fish! I hope you enjoyed your meal! thanks for sharing.
Nice ones. Judging by the colors those are farm trout. I miss fishing the stocked ponds.
Nice going!  Odd they didn't fight too much...even the smaller ones tend to have some spunk in them.  Hope they tasted great!
what pond were those out of? i thought of takin the GF to a pond one day for a gauraunteed catch
